title: Wts: Amazing T206 george brown (wash.) sovereign!!  *SOLD*
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Wts: Amazing T206 george brown (wash.) sovereign!!  *SOLD*
posts.post_content: This card looks like a 7.5 or better. Very, very harshly graded because of a very small and faint tape stain (no paper loss). It's a shame psa does not give qualifiers for light tape stains or this could be a psa 8(st), scans below, $575...thanks
This card looks like an 8! PSA needs to give mild tape stains a qualifier like ink and other marks...would consider trade for certain T206's....thanks
